Retrieve draft pick information by year

Source: R/mlb_draft.R
mlb_draft.Rd

Retrieve draft pick information by year

Usage

mlb_draft(year)

Arguments

year

The year for which to return data

Value

Returns a tibble with information for every draft pick in every round for the year requested

col_nametypes
bis_player_idinteger
pick_roundcharacter
pick_numberinteger
round_pick_numberinteger
rankinteger
pick_valuecharacter
signing_bonuscharacter
scouting_reportcharacter

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(mlb_draft(year = 2020))
